look on.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to watch something happening, without being involved in it or trying to stop it
look on.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Only one man tried to help us, the rest just looked on in silence.
look on.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to consider someone or something in a particular way, or as a particular thing
look on.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: I look on him as a good friend.
Strangers to the village are looked upon with a mixture of fear and suspicion.
